verses.verse: Ephraim <S%H669><s%> <S%H7462>feedeth<s%> on <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and <S%H7291>followeth<s%> after the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>: he <S%H3117>continually<s%> <S%H7235>multiplieth<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> and <S%H7701>desolation<s%>; and they <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%> is <S%H2986>carried<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath also a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>; according to his <S%H4611>doings<s%> will he recompense <S%H7725>him<s%>.
In the <S%H990>womb<s%> he took his <S%H251>brother<s%> by the <S%H6117>heel<s%>; and in his <S%H202>manhood<s%> he had <S%H8280>power<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%>:

yea <S%H7786><s%>, he had power over the <S%H4397>angel<s%>, and <S%H3201>prevailed<s%>; he <S%H1058>wept<s%>, and made <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto <S%H4672>him<s%>: he found him at <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and there he spake with <S%H1696>us<s%>,
even <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is his memorial <S%H2143>name<s%>.
Therefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> thou to thy <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%>, and <S%H6960>wait<s%> for thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
He is a <S%H3667>trafficker<s%>, the <S%H3976>balances<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%> are in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: he <S%H157>loveth<s%> to <S%H6231>oppress<s%>.

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely I am become <S%H6238>rich<s%>, I have found <S%H4672>me<s%> <S%H202>wealth<s%>: in all my <S%H3018>labors<s%> they shall <S%H4672>find<s%> in me no <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> that were <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

But I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; I will yet again make thee to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the solemn <S%H4150>feast<s%>.

I have also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and I have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%>; and by the <S%H3027>ministry<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have I used <S%H1819>similitudes<s%>.

Is <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>? they are altogether <S%H7723>false<s%>; in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H7794>bullocks<s%>; <S%H4196>yea<s%>, their altars are as <S%H1530>heaps<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> for a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and for a <S%H802>wife<s%> he kept <S%H8104>sheep<s%>.
And by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> was he <S%H8104>preserved<s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> hath provoked to <S%H3707>anger<s%> most <S%H8563>bitterly<s%>: therefore shall his <S%H1818>blood<s%> be <S%H5203>left<s%> upon <S%H2781>him<s%>, and his reproach shall his <S%H113>Lord<s%> return unto <S%H7725>him<s%>.
